SOURCES.s_setProperties:
START:s_setProperties DOCTYPE <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd"> PROPERTY this table.columns 1 PROPERTY this table.rows 1 PROPERTY this table.border 0 PROPERTY this table.layout fixed PROPERTY this table.width 100% PROPERTY this table.tdwidth 4% PROPERTY this table.cellpadding 0 PROPERTY this table.className newback2 PROPERTY this table.classNameie newback2 PROPERTY this table.include system/units/bl/resources/fullcalendar.css,system/units/bl/resources/fullcalendar_print.css,system/units/bl/resources/tog.js,system/units/bl/resources/jquery_min.js PROPERTY this td1.overflow visible PROPERTY this td1.indivheight 100%
RETURN 1
